page.title: 20WALKING, CALDER VALE AREA
page.content:
The area around Calder Vale is ideally situated for both short and longer walks.
To the north are the bleak fells of Bowland, whilst to the west and south there is gently undulating farmland with numerous paths and lanes near the valley of the River Brock.
On summer weekends many visitors come by car and on foot to walk down through the woods to the village or alternatively up to the church and beyond. --------------------------------------
{THIS TEXT HAS BEEN COMPILED BY THE 20 {JUNIOR CHILDREN OF ST.JOHN'S CE SCHOOL {CALDER VALE, NEAR PRESTON, LANCASHIRE. -------------------------------------- --------------------------------------
